p: The following species were covered by the study: Abies sachalinensis Mast. (Sachalin fir), Picea glauca ( Moench) Voss (white spruce), Tilia cordata Mill. (small-leaved lime), Aesculus hippocastanum L. (horse-chestnut), Platanus x hispanica Münchh. (London plane), Robinia pseudoacacia L. (black locust tree), Quercus robur L. (English oak), Khaya senegalensis ( Desr.) A. Juss. (African mahogany), Araucaria cunninghamii Aiton ex. D. Don) (hoop pine), and Quercus nigra L. (water oak). See Table 2 for city attribution and characteristic tree dimensions.
